reviews.review:
Toxic City.

Lo instalé, jugué dos partidas donde fue muy obvio que el asesino y algunos sobrevivientes eran amigos, ya que no les hacia absolutamente nada.
Comunidad mas toxica que la fuente donde se cayó el Joker 
El juego es bueno, la comunidad no. Arrepentido de comprarlo para tenerlo ahí tirado.

Es ese bar que te gusta pero se llena de gente infumable.

Si ves al survivor, yo no lo puedo amasijar en el primer gancho porque después dicen te dicen tunelero. Vos lo tenes que llevar al lugar mas recóndito del mapa, cerca del shack y si es posible al sótano, bien escondido. Y ahí lo reventas a golpes, le llevas todos los compañeros, no uno, porque vas a ser hábil campeador y te comes un garrón de la gran flauta. Vos estabas en un estado de emoción violenta y de locura, te quitas el radio de terror, te pones espejo rayado, le rompes todos los pales para demostrar tu estado de locura y de inconsciencia temporal ¿me explico?. Ademas tenes que tener una tortita entera de ofrenda, le pones una y sino la primaria Midwich y empezas el juego asi… sos inimputable, hermano. Haces 32.000 puntos tranquilo.

O jogo em si é muito bom, não é tão legal jogar sozinho então tente encontrar um amigo para jogar, não tenho reclamações do jogo. (a não ser a hitbox bugada e os catch que não funciona de vez em quando).

I was going to write a full comprehsive review but I could literally go on for pages and pages about my thoughts on the game, good and bad.

Instead of that I'll just say it is a fun game if you want to be casual with friends OR if you want to dedicate enough time to learn everything about the game to be able to hold your own and enjoy playing solo. There is no in-between really.

I personally love the grind the game has and I enjoy learning everything about the game in depth, so it was a good purchase for me. You may find it boring if you don't invest the time to learn the specifics and try to improvise. I recommend watching enough gameplay on Twitch or YouTube and learning what the killers can do and how the game works before purchasing. If you plan to play casually with friends then ignore all these reservations and go for it.

игра конечно хорошая, но когда вам попадается ман высокого ранга и вы сбегаете то у вас забирает каплю. Я проиграл игру и заработал меньше очков и у меня ничего не забрали, когда выиграл и сбежал, просто снимают каплю. Странно конечно система работает, но ладно ничего страшного( я сломал стол, стул, испортил сука нервы свои). Игра хорошая, всем советую.

Если вы любитель ранговых матчей, то вы очень сильно будете гореть с этой игры. Вам попадается маньяк у которого 4 ранг, вы же в этот момент имеете 7 ранг, вы ебёте этого мана в сухую и у вас отнимают каплю.Ставлю большой палец ранговой системе в этой игре.

Serious review:
Game is fun, like that new killers and survivors are released frequently, some killers can be overpowered when playing survivor but it adds to the challenge. The online community like many other multiplayer games can often be toxic and there are lots of younger players.

Extract from actual gameplay:

me: I'm an innocent bystander

Killer: *shrugs and kills me*

Me: ok I see how it is

Other survivors: ha get rekt

Game for fun for anyone who likes horrors. Prepare to put into the game more than 100 hours if yo want to achieve something. Don't recommend buying any DLCs till you learn how to play at least  like a middle rank player. You will need tremendous amount of bloodpoints to  upgrade your killers and survivors. So, get about 1 million bloodpoints and then consider about acquiring DLCs. The only DLC which worth considering when you start the game if you like to play for the killer it is definitely  Leatherface DLC as you will get more bloodpoints while playing with him beacuase of his perks. Be aware of rude and barbarian players in the chat and don't hesitate to report them if you see inappropriate speech. Respect comes from within us, not from others. Danger: will take all your free time.

Минусы этой МуСоРа:
1.Оптимизация
2.Покойся с миром конфиги
3.Много багов
4. Не знаю что
新手没体验，玩屠夫第二局遇到挂，改档巨多，四个人有三人类18段三传承满级技能，玩人类秒进，屠夫要匹配二十分钟左右，18段屠夫能匹配到红段人类车队，人类透视微调移速比较多，走地4.6起杀戮直线没他快，且爱嘲讽，容易坏心态。国服环境人类爱拔线，地图bug很多，国服环境对新手玩家尤其是屠夫不友好。

Once I was being in a chase by a killer.
Super intense situation and I could feel the killer running close behind me.
I was already hurt from earlier in the game.
I felt his breath in my neck, and I could hear him raising his blade at me.
At the same time as he stabbed me in the back and I fell to the ground, my daughter tapped me on the shoulder to ask me something.

Поиграл я значит в эту помойку и скажу что игра гавно и все в этой игре гавно но я люблю эту игру

[h1] Kleines Update meiner Rezension [/h1]

[b]Prinzip:[/b] Ein brutales asynchrones Fang- & Versteckspiel mit 1 Killer & 4 Überlebenden. Diese Survivor haben als Aufgabe 5 von 7 Generatoren zu reparieren, um danach durch einen von zwei Ausgängen zu gelangen.

Nach nun [b]5000 Spielstunden[/b] bleibt das Spiel immer noch spannend, da jede Runde eine [u]neue Herausforderung[/u] ist, indem viele Variablen mit einspielen, wie: [list]
[*] diverse zufällige & nie gleich bleibende Karten
[*] verschiedene Killer mit unterschiedlichen Fähigkeiten
[*] eine gute Auswahl an Vorteilen bzw. Perks, die eigene Spielarten kreieren
[*]ein verrücktes Rangsystem mit unabhängigen Matchmaking
[*]mysteriöse und komplexe Mitspieler aka Randoms [/list]

Dazu bietet DbD noch viel mehr, wie: [list]
[*] nen Riftpass mit Skins und etlichen Charms
[*] nen Archiv mit Missionen für Punkte!
[*] regelmäßig Events und somit Punkte!!
[*] Bugs, nein, Features und Schubs-di-wups Codes mit Punkten :O
[*] intensive Lobby-Wartezeiten für gemütliche Pläuschchen
[*] erstaunliche Hitbox'n von Projektilen und Objekten [/list]

Um erstmal ins Spiel rein zu kommen, brauchen die meisten hunderte Spielstunden, wo vieles unfair erscheint. Darum ich empfehle: beide Perspektiven zu spielen, um sich ein besseres Bild machen zu können - was nur leider viel Grind von Punkten erfordert.
Tatsächlich sind auch einige Sachen [u]unbalanced[/u] und nicht zu Ende gedacht, weswegen jede Runde anders laufen kann, egal ob man sein bestes gegeben hat oder nicht. Heißt man sollte eine gewisse Mentalität mitbringen, dass es gute als auch schlechte Runden gibt.

[b]Zusammengefasst[/b] hat das Spiel noch großes Potenzial sich im Großen und Ganzen zu verbessern. [spoiler][i]Bloß so wie ich die Entwickler kenne, wird sich daran nur langsam etwas ändern.[/i][/spoiler]
Trotzdem das Gameplay wird einfach nicht langweilig und macht unsagbar viel Spaß, vor allem wenn man mit Freunden spielt und schwierige Situationen meistert.

I say yes because this game has made me have so much fun, I love playing Huntress and got pretty good, Rank 3 actually. I love the dynamics of the game but there are MAJOR issues. First being toxicity, i had 3/4 players leave one of my games and call me trash because i wasn't "Playing Fun, and Tunneling." I hooked one dude and after he was unhooked i saw him run, i choose to chase his buddy but when i lost him i went back towards the hook. After finding the dude with Nurses calling I downed him, but i didn't pick him up and instead left him for his buddy to come pick up and went back to do other things like gen control. After 2 mins he was still downed so i went to pick him up, and he DC'ed in my arms. It annoys me how scummy people will play even after you give them 2 FREE CHANCES TO LIVE. I then was called "Shit" needed to "Getgud." and he apparently "Fucked my mom." so yeah, its like MW2 all over again but this time you can throw bigger hatchets.

Довольно интересная и занимательная игра, правда раздражает местная система микроплатежей. Но, в этой игре она куда лучше чем в том же PayDay 2. Можно спокойно играть без дополнений и купить таким образом, почти, весь контент за внутреигровую валюту. Ещё огромно растраевает отсутствие голосового чата, из-за чего тяжело понять реакцию жертвы на твоё резкое появление в роли маньяка. А так игра довольно весёлая, особенно если играть в команде.

This game is fun, but it would be nice if I did not crash constantly and have endless connection issues when I try to play with my friends. I will be happy to edit my review when the problem ceases, because this is actually a pretty fun game when I am not having connectivity issue. It's just a shame it happen pretty much after every match. I glitch and my friends say they no longer see me in the party lobby (and cannot invite me back), yet for me everything looks normal. Currently I just restart the game when this happens, but yesterday when I was playing this with my friends, I restarted my computer at least 5 times to try to fix the issue! I got so angry and annoyed.

But basically if there are no connection issues, it is a fun game and I would recommend it.

UPDATE: After uninstalling this and reinstalling it, it seems the issue is fixed. I no longer crash and the game works perfectly!

Besonders mit Freunden ein großer Spaß. Manchmal erschrecke ich mich heute noch, was mir recht gut gefällt. Natürlich gewöhnt man sich daran, so gruselig ist es nicht. Ich spiele es immer mal wieder mit 3 guten Freunden. Aber auch als Killer kann man viel Spaß machen. Jetzt wo die Grafik verbessert wurde, sind einige Maps ein richtiger Augenschmaus. Am Anfang muss man etwas Geduld haben, um in das Spiel besser rein zu kommen. Aber umso mehr man es spielt, umso besser ist es. Ich empfehle es. Außerdem gibt es Fashion, wenn man möchte. :)

Very fun with friends as survivor, fun solo as killer. Can cause feelings of humiliation and anger when losing, but if you take the game as a game and remember that fact, it's really quite enjoyable. GG WP All <3
